description: Records a heartbeat for the lifecycle action associated with the specified token or instance. This extends the timeout by the length of time defined using the PutLifecycleHook API call. This step is a part of the procedure for adding a lifecycle hook to an Auto Scaling group: For more information, see Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling lifecycle hooks in the Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling User Guide.

parameters.name: LifecycleHookName
parameters.description: The name of the lifecycle hook.

parameters.name: AutoScalingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.
